item.title: ios ar
item.description: Triangles Vertices Normals UVS Unity、Unreal Engine和Scenekit， SceneKit or SpriteKit to display AR content. 3D SceneKit (DAE files) 2D SpriteKit GLKit Scene Kit 基础知识 What’s New in Scene Kit https://developer.apple.com/videos/wwdc/2014/?id=609 Scene Kit 做游戏 Building a Game with Scene Kit https://developer.apple.com/videos/wwdc/2014/?id=610
